tool_description: This is the unofficial documentation for the Data.Police.UK API.
name: Data.Police.UK
title: Data.Police.UK

api_list.name: Last updated
api_list.description: Crime data in the API is updated once a month. Find out when it was last updated.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stolenbikes88-datapoliceuk.p.rapidapi.com/crime-last-updated"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stolenbikes88-datapoliceuk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stolenbikes88-datapoliceuk.p.rapidapi.com/crime-last-updated"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stolenbikes88-datapoliceuk.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: Crime categories
api_list.description: Returns a list of valid categories for a given data set date.

api_list.name: Street-level outcomes
api_list.description: Outcomes at street-level; either at a specific location, within a 1 mile radius of a single point, or within a custom area.

api_list.name: Specific Force
api_list.description: Provides detailed information about a specific force.

api_list.name: Crimes at location
api_list.description: Returns just the crimes which occurred at the specified location, rather than those within a radius. If given latitude and longitude, finds the nearest pre-defined location and returns the crimes which occurred there.

api_list.name: Street-level crimes
api_list.description: Crimes at street-level; either within a 1 mile radius of a single point, or within a custom area. For custom areas see http://data.police.uk/docs/method/crime-street/

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Month to show in YYYY-MM format

api_list.name: Outcomes for a specific crime
api_list.description: Returns the outcomes (case history) for the specified crime. Crime ID is 64-character identifier, as returned by other API methods.

api_list.name: Street level availability
api_list.description: Return a list of available data sets.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stolenbikes88-datapoliceuk.p.rapidapi.com/crimes-street-dates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stolenbikes88-datapoliceuk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Crimes with no location
api_list.description: Returns a list of crimes where the responsible force hasn't specified a location.

api_list.name: Forces
api_list.description: A list of all the police forces available via the API. Unique force identifiers obtained here are used in requests for force-specific data via other methods.
